text: Sir John Augustus Fitzroy Watts (1921 or 1922 - 11 May 2015) was a Grenadian dentist and politician. He served as the President of the Senate twice, from 1988 until 1990 and 1995 until 2004. He was also the co-founder of the Grenada National Party. Watts was born in St. Patrick. He died on 11 May 2015 in St. George's, aged 93. ==References== Category:1920s births Category:2015 deaths Category:Commanders of the Order of the British Empire Category:Grenadian politicians
title: John Watts (Grenadian politician)
